page.title: 15Mr. Alderton - The Farrier
page.content: Mr.Alderton lives in Lambourn but was born in Eastbury.The forge that he works in,is oppositethe cottage where he was born.He has been living in Lambourn for 24 years.At the forge he uses coke to keep the fires going.Aton of coke costs about Â£150 and lasts about two months.It costs Â£15 for a new set of horse shoes.Mr.Alderton shod 'Snow Knight'the winner of the 1974 Derby.He goes to the stables and shoes the horses there.The horses have the heavy shoes for practice and for racing they wear the aluminium,lighter shoes.He had one apprentice,his nephew,and he is now a qualified farrier.Mr.Alderton's hobbies are playing billiards and snooker.He uses 7 different tools.A buffer,2 hammers,1 rasp,1 hoof parer,1 draw knife,1 pair of clenching tongs and 2 pairs of pincers.He makes at least 20 horseshoe
